metadata.og:description: View deals for Breve Azurine Lagoon Retreat, including fully refundable rates with free cancellation. Pancuran Beach is minutes away. Breakfast, WiFi, and parking are free at this hotel. All rooms have balconies/patios and coffee makers.

Photo gallery for Breve Azurine Lagoon Retreat

  • Overview
  • Rooms
  • Location
  • Policies
Immerse yourself in the island vibes at Breve Azurine Lagoon Retreat, where a private beach and garden create a serene atmosphere. Enjoy beachfront dining, kayaking, snorkeling and relaxing massages on-site or unwind by the swimming pool with sun loungers. Previous guests have appreciated the welcoming staff.

Reviews

8.68.6 out of 10
Excellent

  • 2 restaurants and 2 bars/lounges
  • Beach umbrellas
  • Beach sun loungers
  • Beach towels
  • Spa services
  • Airport shuttle
  • Ferry terminal shuttle
  • Terrace
  • 24-hour front desk
  • Air conditioning

For families (6)

  • Children stay free
  • Free cribs/infant beds
  • Playground on site
  • Connecting/adjoining rooms available
  • Separate sitting area
  • Garden
